channel.title: 2 questions,Weapon styles
channel.description:
1. When I equip like Mage short and stuff,It has 4 melle combat weapon styles,instead of the 3 range styles. Same with abby whip,4 styles instead of 3. And when your unarmed it has the 4 combat options How can I fix this?
2. Can anyone give me a tutorial for like simple specs,Like just DDS and whip,Maybe just dds-Please don't give me the link to Paladinos 98% Specs.
